extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected Devices
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the device is affected by verifying the firmware version. Devices with firmware version FW03 or lower are affected.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the device affected (FW03 or lower)?

extracted_playbook.title: Update Device Firmware
extracted_playbook.description: Update the firmware of affected devices to a version higher than FW03.

extracted_playbook.title: Restrict Network Access
extracted_playbook.description: Restrict network access to the device by not connecting it directly to the internet and disabling unused TCP/UDP ports.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable Web-Based Management Ports
extracted_playbook.description: Disable web-based management ports 80/443 after the configuration phase to enhance security.
